name: Wisdom Jump
description:
After getting your wisdom teeth removed you believe you see all kinds of things.. The question is, how will these hallucinations effect your high score!!

All you need is "A" and "D" to manoeuvre through your obstacles!

This is my first submitted Game Jam for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1, theme "It is not real".

Unfortunately I only had two days to complete this and a couple months of game dev experience! However, I hope you enjoy Wisdom Jump!
